channel.title: Game Stuck On Menu
channel.description: Whenever I click load game it brings me to the pause menu but with all options removed except 'return to game' and 'quit' but the only one I can click is quit so I'm stuck on the pause menu unless I leave. it's super frustrating because I got pretty far in Xen and I want to beat the game because I loved it so far, so pls help.

Try this:

Black Mesa: Community Forums – 17 Mar 20

[BUG] game stuck in "Pause" when pressing ESC button after quicksave

Until this is fixed, you can just press the “Pause” button at the top right of your keyboard to resume. I’ve noticed pressing ESC again will Pause the game instead of bringing up the menu though, so no settings or anything. Just a temporary fix so...
